mapper.select: SELECT review_no, re_title, re_content, re_date, item_no, customer_id FROM review WHERE item_no = #{item_no} ORDER BY re_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (item_no, customer_id,re_title, re_content, re_date) VALUES (#{item_no}, #{customer_id}, #{re_title}, #{re_content}, sysdate)
